item.title: Cheatsheets
item.description: Supervised Learning k-Nearest Neighbors [ Supervised Learning Classification ] : Linear Regression [ Supervised Learning Regression ] : Lasso [ Supervised Learning Regression Regularization ] : Ridge [ Supervised Learning Regression Regularization ] : ElasticNet [ Supervised Learning Regression Regularization ] : Unsupervised Learning k-Means [ Unsupervised Learning ] : t-SNE [ Unsupervised Learning ] : PCA [ Unsupervised Learning Dimension Reduction Feature Selection ] : NMF [ Unsupervised Learning ] : Non-negative Matrix Factoring
